set_push_log.sql:
INSERT INTO `push_log` (`push_id`, `date`, `user`)
                   VALUES (?, ?, ?)
                   ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `push_id`=`push_id`

set_node.sql:
INSERT INTO `nodes` (`node`, `author`, `branch`, `desc`, `push_log_id`)
                   VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
                   ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `node`=`node`

set_file.sql:
INSERT INTO `files` (`node_id`, `filespec`)
                   VALUES (?,?)
                   ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `node_id`=`node_id`
